title: Civil War Defenses of Washington: Civil War Forts and Today's Neighborhoods
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Places     Civil War Forts and Today's Neighborhoods                Civil War Forts and Today's Neighborhoods       The African American Civil War Descendants Study focuses on eight Civil War Defenses of Washington forts and the contemporary neighborhoods nearby. Click on the map below to learn more about these locations.  Â     Click on the map above to learn more about the Civil War defenses near your neighborhood.
